Question: Are there any family plans available with U Mobile?

Answer.text: Yes, U Mobile offers several family plans that cater to different needs and budgets. Here are some of the plans they offer: Family Postpaid Plan: This plan provides 1000GB of sharable data and free global roaming for up to 4 lines, at a cost of RM 128 per month. Additional perks include free calls across multiple lines and high-speed internet sharing.
